title: Salesforce Extension for Chrome + Gmail
content:
Instructions Download from Web Store. Click “Use Custom Domain” and enter “Simplifi” [Image] After logging in, go back into the Okta portal (login.simpli.fi) Open your Gmail account from within the Okta portal (Google Workspace Mail) The Salesforce icon should now appear within your Gmail extensions (not just your Chrome extensions). Follow the prompts for the setup configuration. Troubleshooting Once you have downloaded the extension and logged in, please note that you will need to click the Salesforce icon from within your Gmail inbox. If you do not see it, please ensure that you have followed the steps above. Also, you can try to refresh your inbox tab in Chrome. You should see it just beneath your photo in Gmail: [Image]
